reply.content: Thanks for the review!

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback!

author: Gal Kraft
comment: Great tanks

reply.author: Viktor Adam

author: Charlie-Ben Glassman
comment: Does what it says it does. Only concern is that the animations slow down the watch. It has 12 and 24h format, you can choose how many strings are animated and if the strings are constantly animating or animate every second. Either way, really cool and very much so recommend.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for the review!

title: App

author: Ben Palmer
comment: Really like the look of this watch face but it seems despite what the change log states there isn't a way to adjust the settings at all, no 12hr format option, no color selection option etc. Wondering why that is missing. EDIT: Thank you, I see that now and can adjust them. I think now just to provide some color choices/selections and it would be even better. Even if there are some presets to choose from instead of individual color choices at first.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! At the moment settings are only available on the watch (should be in the watchface selection list under the watchface).

title: Options & Settings?

author: Nikola Grigorov
comment: Apparently the battery drop is not caused by this but this is one of the most original faces currently available. If you can add weather somehow would be great . Well done !

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Hi! Thanks for the review! The constant animation might drain the battery quickly when the watch is in non-ambient mode. There is also a setting to do a short animation each second that should be easier on the battery.

title: Awesome

author: Tim Kroupa
comment: I like this watch face but do not like red/green combo.  5 stars if given more options.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!

title: More colors please

author: Georgios Papageorgiou
comment: Is one of the faces got my eye that's for the 5 stars, wish if we could customize it a bit

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!

title: Is awesome

author: Michael Norris
comment: Love this watch face. The only thing it's missing is a 12 hour option.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback! You can switch the 12/24 hour display mode in the settings on the watch. There is no configuration in the phone app at the moment. On the watch press and hold the watchface then tap the gear icon. Thank you!

comment: I tried many faces and this one is the my favorite.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you, I'm glad you like it. :)

title: The best watch face

author: roy smith-james
comment: This by far one of the better watch faces out there. Five stars if there could be a bit more customisation and the ability to add more information like weather. Etc.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback and for the suggestion!

author: Patricia Elliott
comment: I can't find it to go on my screen.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Hi! This is a watchface for Android Wear smartwatches. After installing it you should be able to select it on the watch or in the Android Wear application on the phone. If it does not show up you can try the Resync all apps option in the Android Wear app's settings.

title: Widget

author: Dmitri Marusin
comment: Very clean. Nicely done.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!

title: Enjoy it more than expected.

author: Charlie Turpin
comment: Thank you but I managed to get it to work by just reinstalling it. Although I will keep this in mind if I ever have any other problems. This is a great background and I love it. The only change I would make is being able to change the colours of the strings/waves. This could be controlled on the phone.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: I'm glad you got it work in the end and that you like it. :) Thabks for the suggestion too, I appreciate it!

title: Great

author: Prashant Kumar Gupta
comment: Very nice watch face to have on android wear. Wanted to give 5 stars but on my gear live the strings got distorted in idle/standby mode. Kindly resolve this issue.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! Unfortunately I can't test it on a Gear Live but I assume in standby mode the resolution is probably lower and that's causing the distortion. Maybe send a photo of it in email and I'll see what I can do. :)

title: Very nice watch face

author: Kinan Aldebes
comment: A simple effective idea that works. It could use some customization options however, such as strings position, count, and custom colors. EDIT: I had to factory reset my watch recently, and now the 12/24 hour option works correctly, thank you for looking into it. I suggest removing the leading zero and adding a PM/AM symbol instead.

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Edit: Thanks for your updated feedback! I'll see what I can do.

title: Beautiful Design

author: Amilka Moses
comment: My favourite so far.   Would like the option of full animation in live mode and/or second animation in ambient mode. Definitely a battery killer but it would look awesome. Would give 5 stars for any of these features.    Thanks for all your hard work so far.  Update: OMG! Thanks for enabling the full animation! :D I don't think I paid for this app, anywhere I can donate?

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content:
Thanks! :)
The latest update has this option now. Update: just enjoy it! :)

title: Excellent and simple watch face (LG Urbane)

author: Mark Davis
comment: This is my favourite watch face by far. Top design runs smoothly on my moto 360. Thanks keep up the outstanding work..wicked job.. :)

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Thank you very much! :)

title: One of the best

author: Chris Pham
comment: I've installed this watch face 3 times but for some reason it doesn't show up on my moto 360. Haaalp!

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content:
You may have to wait a bit for the watch to synchronize new apps. You can also try the Resync apps option in the Android Wear application on your phone to force it.
Please send me an email if this doesn't help. Thanks!

title: Doesn't show up..

author: Peeyush Chawla
comment: I Have install this app..but it seems like it hasn't installed...its not working

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: Sometimes it takes some time to synchronize apps to the watch. I would try reinstalling the app or re-syncing all apps from the Android Wear application. Hope this helps!

reply.author: Viktor Adam
reply.content: You may have to wait a bit for the watch to synchronize new apps. You can also try the Resync apps option in the Android Wear application on your phone to force it.
